name: application-monitoring
description: Also called the Empower Plant UI/UX. This project was bootstrapped with [Create React App](https://github.com/facebook/create-react-app). Features the following... - Error Monitoring...Performance Monitoring...Release Health... - BrowserTracing (Performance)   - Sentry.Profiler (class components)   - Sentry.withSentryRouting(Route); (react-router)   - FlaskIntegration, SqlAlchemyIntegration
